Class Student

java.lang.Object
Student
public class Student extends Object
Represents a student with a name and quiz scores. The Student class provides methods to add quiz scores, get the total score, and calculate the average score.z

    Description
    Student(String name)
    Constructs a Student object with the given name.

      public Student(String name)
      Constructs a Student object with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the student.

  • Method Details

    • addQuiz

      public void addQuiz(int score)
      Adds a quiz score to the total quiz score and updates the number of quizzes taken.
      Parameters:
      score - The score of the quiz to be added.

    • getTotalScore

      public int getTotalScore()
      Gets the total score of all quizzes taken.
      Returns:
      The total quiz score.

    • getAverageScore

      public double getAverageScore()
      Calculates and returns the average score of all quizzes taken. If no quizzes are taken, returns 0.
      Returns:
      The average quiz score.
